name: @injectivelabs/contracts
description: Contracts wrapper that can be reused throughout Injective's projects.

scripts.build: tsc --build tsconfig.build.json && tsc --build tsconfig.build.esm.json && yarn build:post && link-module-alias
scripts.build:watch: tsc --build -w tsconfig.build.json && tsc -w --build tsconfig.build.esm.json && yarn build:post && link-module-alias
scripts.build:post: shx cp ../../stub/package.json.stub dist/cjs/package.json && shx cp ../../stub/package.esm.json.stub dist/esm/package.json
scripts.clean: tsc --build tsconfig.build.json --clean && tsc --build tsconfig.build.esm.json --clean && shx rm -rf coverage *.log junit.xml dist && jest --clearCache
